name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Place sugar cube in rocks glass. Saturate with bitters and a splash of water. Muddle until dissolved. Add whiskey and a large ice cube. Stir gently. Express orange peel over the glass and drop in as garnish.

name: Manhattan
instructions: Add whiskey, vermouth, and bitters to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker. Dry shake without ice for 15 seconds if using egg white. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Dash bitters on top of foam.

name: Margarita
instructions: If desired, rim a rocks glass with salt. Add tequila, lime juice, triple sec, and agave to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into the prepared glass over fresh ice.

name: Paloma
instructions: Add tequila, lime juice, and salt to a highball glass with ice. Top with grapefruit soda. Stir gently to combine. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Daiquiri
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Mojito
instructions: Gently muddle mint leaves with simple syrup in a highball glass. Add rum and lime juice. Fill with ice and top with club soda. Stir gently. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Mai Tai
instructions: Add both rums, lime juice, curaçao, and orgeat to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Negroni
instructions: Add gin, Campari, and vermouth to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Express orange peel and drop in as garnish.

name: Gin & Tonic
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add gin, then top with tonic water. Stir gently once. Squeeze lime wedge over drink and drop in.

name: Martini
ingredients: Lemon twist or olive for garnish
instructions: Add gin and vermouth to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until very cold, about 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or olives.

name: French 75
instructions: Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Last Word
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Moscow Mule
instructions: Add vodka and lime juice to a copper mug or highball glass filled with ice. Top with ginger beer. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Espresso Martini
instructions: Add vodka, espresso, coffee liqueur, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously until very cold and frothy. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with coffee beans.

name: Sidecar
instructions: If desired, rim a coupe glass with sugar. Add cognac, triple sec, and lemon juice to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into the prepared glass.

name: Aperol Spritz
instructions: Fill a wine glass with ice. Add Prosecco, then Aperol. Top with club soda. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Boulevardier
instructions: Add bourbon, Campari, and vermouth to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Express orange peel and garnish.

name: Penicillin
instructions: Add blended Scotch, lemon juice, and honey-ginger syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Float Islay Scotch on top. Garnish with candied ginger.

name: Amaretto Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker. Dry shake without ice for 15 seconds if using egg white. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Dash bitters on top.

name: Clover Club
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker. Dry shake without ice for 15 seconds. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Gimlet
instructions: Add gin, lime juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Sazerac
instructions: Rinse a chilled rocks glass with absinthe and discard excess. In a mixing glass, muddle sugar cube with bitters. Add rye and ice, stir until well-chilled. Strain into prepared glass. Express lemon peel over drink and discard.

name: Corpse Reviver #2
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Pisco Sour
instructions: Add pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white to a shaker. Dry shake vigorously for 15 seconds. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a chilled coupe. Dash bitters on the foam.

name: Vieux Carré
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.

name: Gin Basil Smash
instructions: Muddle basil leaves with simple syrup in a shaker. Add gin, lemon juice, and ice. Shake vigorously. Double strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a basil sprig.

name: Naked and Famous
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Paper Plane
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Jungle Bird
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
instructions: Add vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake briefly. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with cola. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Bloody Mary
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Roll back and forth to mix (don't shake too hard). Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with celery stalk and lemon wedge.

name: Tom Collins
instructions: Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake until chilled. Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon wheel and cherry.

name: Irish Coffee
instructions: Warm an Irish coffee mug. Add brown sugar and hot coffee, stir to dissolve. Add Irish whiskey. Float lightly whipped cream on top by pouring over the back of a spoon.

name: Piña Colada
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with 1 cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass or large goblet. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and cherry.

name: Caipirinha
instructions: Place lime quarters and sugar in a rocks glass. Muddle firmly to extract juice and oils. Fill with ice and add cachaça. Stir well to combine.

name: Vesper
instructions: Add gin, vodka, and Lillet to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until very cold. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Express lemon peel over the drink and drop in.

name: Mimosa
instructions: Pour orange juice into a champagne flute. Top with champagne. Stir gently once.

name: Bellini
instructions: Add peach purée to a champagne flute. Top with prosecco. Stir gently to combine.

name: Gin Fizz
instructions: Add gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white to a shaker. Dry shake for 15 seconds. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a highball glass without ice. Top with club soda.

name: Ramos Gin Fizz
instructions: Add all ingredients except soda to a shaker. Dry shake vigorously for 2-3 minutes. Add ice and shake for another minute. Strain into a Collins glass without ice. Let settle for a minute, then top with soda.

name: Bee's Knees
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Aviation
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a brandied cherry.

name: White Lady
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker. Dry shake for 10 seconds if using egg white. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Dark 'n' Stormy
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add lime juice and ginger beer. Float dark rum on top. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Painkiller
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass or tiki mug filled with crushed ice. Grate fresh nutmeg on top.

name: Hanky Panky
instructions: Add gin, vermouth, and Fernet to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass. Express orange peel and garnish.

name: Americano
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Campari and vermouth. Top with club soda. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Martinez
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Batanga
instructions: Rim a highball glass with salt. Fill with ice. Add tequila and lime juice. Top with cola. Stir with a knife (traditional).

name: Carajillo
instructions: Add Licor 43 and espresso to a shaker with ice. Shake briefly. Strain into a rocks glass over ice.

name: Cantaritos
instructions: Rim a clay cup or highball glass with sal de gusano. Fill with ice. Add tequila and citrus juices. Top with grapefruit soda. Stir gently.

name: Bramble
ingredients: Lemon slice and blackberries for garnish
instructions: Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake until chilled. Strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Drizzle crème de mûre over the top. Garnish with lemon and blackberries.

name: Lemon Drop
instructions: Rim a martini glass with sugar. Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Sex on the Beach
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until chilled. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

name: Blue Lagoon
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka and blue curaçao. Top with lemonade. Stir gently. Garnish with a lemon wheel and cherry.

name: Tequila Sunrise
ingredients: Orange slice and cherry for garnish
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add tequila and orange juice. Stir gently. Slowly pour grenadine down the inside of the glass to create sunrise effect. Garnish with orange and cherry.

name: White Russian
instructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice. Add vodka and coffee liqueur. Stir briefly. Float cream on top by pouring over the back of a spoon.

name: Kir Royale
instructions: Add crème de cassis to a champagne flute. Top with champagne. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Mint Julep
instructions: Gently muddle mint leaves with simple syrup in a julep cup. Fill with crushed ice. Add bourbon. Stir until cup is frosty. Top with more crushed ice. Garnish with a large mint sprig.

name: Singapore Sling
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a hurricane glass or sling glass filled with ice. Garnish with pineapple and cherry.

name: Zombie
instructions: Add all ingredients except 151 rum to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a tiki mug or tall glass filled with crushed ice. Float 151 rum on top. Garnish with mint.

name: Hurricane
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

name: French Martini
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously until well-chilled and frothy. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Black Russian
instructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice. Add vodka and coffee liqueur. Stir gently to combine.

name: Grasshopper
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Brandy Alexander
instructions: Add cognac, crème de cacao, and cream to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Grate fresh nutmeg on top.

name: Gibson
instructions: Add gin and vermouth to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until very cold. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with cocktail onions.

name: Bamboo
instructions: Add sherry, vermouth, and bitters to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora or coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Champagne Cocktail
instructions: Place sugar cube in a champagne flute. Saturate with bitters. Top with champagne. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Hemingway Daiquiri
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Ti' Punch
instructions: Cut a disc from the side of a lime (about the size of a quarter). Place in a rocks glass. Add cane syrup. Muddle gently. Add rhum agricole. Stir. Add ice if desired (traditionally served without).

name: Southside
instructions: Gently muddle mint with simple syrup in a shaker. Add gin, lime juice, and ice. Shake well. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Mary Pickford
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Jack Rose
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Rob Roy
instructions: Add scotch, vermouth, and bitters to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a brandied cherry.

name: Blood and Sand
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Ward Eight
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

name: Salty Dog
instructions: Rim a highball glass with salt. Fill with ice. Add gin and grapefruit juice. Stir gently.

name: Screwdriver
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka and orange juice. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange wheel.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka and orange juice. Stir. Float Galliano on top. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Kamikaze
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass or serve as a shot.

name: Mudslide
instructions: Add vodka, coffee liqueur, and Irish cream to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Drizzle chocolate syrup inside a rocks glass. Strain cocktail into glass over ice.

name: Sea Breeze
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add all ingredients. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Cape Codder
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka and cranberry juice. Stir gently. Squeeze lime wedge over drink and drop in.

name: Woo Woo
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add all ingredients. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Appletini
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a thin apple slice.

name: Rusty Nail
instructions: Add scotch and Drambuie to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Godfather
instructions: Add scotch and amaretto to a rocks glass with ice. Stir gently to combine.

name: Stinger
instructions: Add cognac and crème de menthe to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass or rocks glass over ice.

name: Golden Cadillac
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Midori Sour
instructions: Add Midori, lemon juice, and lime juice to a shaker with ice. Shake until chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over ice. Top with a splash of soda. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Lynchburg Lemonade
instructions: Add whiskey, triple sec, and lemon juice to a shaker with ice. Shake briefly. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Hugo Spritz
instructions: Fill a wine glass with ice. Add prosecco, elderflower liqueur, and club soda. Add mint leaves and lime slice. Stir gently.

name: Garibaldi
instructions: Juice oranges and blend or shake vigorously to aerate (fluffy texture). Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Campari. Top with fluffy orange juice. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Enzoni
instructions: Muddle grapes in a shaker. Add gin, Campari, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Shake well. Double strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a grape.

name: Chartreuse Swizzle
instructions: Add all ingredients to a Collins glass. Fill with crushed ice. Swizzle with a barspoon or swizzle stick until glass is frosted. Top with more crushed ice. Grate nutmeg on top.

name: Final Ward
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Bijou
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora or coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Navy Grog
instructions: Add all ingredients except soda to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a double rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a lime wheel and mint.

name: Three Dots and a Dash
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice. Garnish with 3 cherries and a pineapple frond (V for victory).

name: Saturn
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Jet Pilot
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice. Garnish with mint sprig.

name: Porn Star Martini
instructions: Add vodka, passion fruit liqueur, purée, lime juice, and vanilla syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a coupe glass. Float half a passion fruit on top. Serve with a shot of prosecco on the side.
